name: The Forbidden Forest Demo
description:
Welcome to The Forbidden Forest! The Forbidden Forest is a pixel art metroidvania videogame, designed in the likes of Hollow Knight, The Ori Games, and Super Paper Mario. It plans to be released on Steam and Windows as of right now, but that can only happen with your help.  If you would like to donate to support this game, please do so! Every little bit counts! 

If you'd like to check out the reveal trailer, you can do so here: https://www.youtube.com/@StoneStudiosOfficial

If you'd like to see this website, the link is here: https://stone-studios.webnode.page/

Please keep in mind this is an early demo release. There will be bugs, if there is, be sure to leave them in a comment below, that way I can fix it and make the game even better.

THE GAME ISN'T RECOGNISED BY WINDOWS DEFENDER,  SO IF IT REFUSES TO RUN, CLICK MORE INFO, RUN ANYWAY. I haven't checked with other operating systems, so if you have an operating system that isn't windows, I highly advise you leave a comment telling me what happens. 

When you complete the demo, please fill out this google form:

https://forms.gle/3cQqq8XXQXB5zkpj9 

Thanks for Playing!
